name: ptb-backend
description: Backend for the Press the Button game.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin master && git subtree push --prefix backend heroku master
